Name: King Of Water
About the game: This is a classic game where big fishes swallow small fishes. Player act as a small fish at the beginning, and try to hunt smaller fishes and avoid bigger fishes' attack. The more fishes player swallow, bigger the size player will be, and stronger the player will be. Here, player will also need to face the threat from land such as toxic garbage, dangerous hunter with his fishing tools. Whatâ€™s more, there are also some mysterious, terrible and extremely dangerous monsters in deep water. You will need to escape from them or come up with some methods to conquer them ,and finally become the most powerful and free one in this water. More than 10 different types of fishes. Complex conditions from the land. Mysterious Monsters. Complex and interesting game elements interaction.
